MonksTokenBar.CombatTurnMovementLimited: Movement is set to combat turn, it's currently not your turn
MonksTokenBar.RequestNoneActorSelected: Cannot send request if no actors selected
MonksTokenBar.RequestNoneTokenSelected: Cannot send request if no tokens selected
MonksTokenBar.RequestActorMissing: Cannot send request if either actor is missing
MonksTokenBar.TokenNoActorAttrs: token has no actor to use for additional attributes
MonksTokenBar.ActorNoRollFunction: : Could not find function to roll

notify-on-change.name: Notify on Movement Change
notify-on-change.hint: Send a notification to all players when the GM changes the allowable movement

show-xp-dialog.name: Show XP Dialog
show-xp-dialog.hint: Show the XP Dialog automatically after you complete an encounter

divide-xp.name: Divide XP among player
divide-xp.hint: In the assign XP dialog, automatically divide the xp amongst the players

token-pictures.name: Token Pictures
token-pictures.hint: Choose to use the token image or the actors portrait image on the tokenbar

allow-player.name: Allow Player to use
allow-player.hint: Allow the player to use the toolbar, restricted to characters they own.

disable-tokenbar.name: Disable Tokenbar
disable-tokenbar.hint: If you don't wish to see the tokenbar, click this setting

stat1-icon.name: Stat1 Icon
stat1-icon.hint: Change the icon to display for the first stat.

stat1-resource.name: Stat1 Resource
stat1-resource.hint: Change the resource displayed by the first stat

stat2-icon.name: Stat2 Icon
stat2-icon.hint: Change the icon to display for the second stat.

stat2-resource.name: Stat2 Resource
stat2-resource.hint: Change the resource displayed by the second stat

movement-after-combat.name: Set movement after combat
movement-after-combat.hint: When combat ends, select what movement type to set it back to

change-to-combat.name: Change movement to combat
change-to-combat.hint: Change movement to combat when combat starts

assign-loot.name: Convert enemies to lootable
assign-loot.hint: Only works with the Loot Sheet module, but once the combat is over, convert the fallen enemies to lootable

popout-tokenbar.name: Popout TokenBar
popout-tokenbar.hint: Put the TokenBar in a dialog window so that you can use the PopOut! module.

delete-after-grab.name: Delete message after grab
delete-after-grab.hint: Delete the message after grabbing a players message roll for a requested roll.
